name: propanoyl-CoA:(2S)-methylmalonyl-CoA malonyltransferase (cyclizing); propanoyl-CoA:(2S)-methylmalonyl-CoA 2-C-acyltransferase (decarboxylating, oxoacyl-reducing and cyclizing)
definition: Propanoyl-CoA + 6 (S)-Methylmalonyl-CoA + 6 NADPH + 6 H+ <=> 6-Deoxyerythronolide B + 7 CoA + 6 CO2 + H2O + 6 NADP+

name: propanoyl-CoA:(2S)-methylmalonyl-CoA malonyltransferase (cyclizing); propanoyl-CoA:(2S)-methylmalonyl-CoA 2-C-acyltransferase (decarboxylating, oxoacyl-reducing and cyclizing)
definition: Propanoyl-CoA + 6 (S)-Methylmalonyl-CoA + 6 NADPH + 6 H+ <=> 6-Deoxyerythronolide B + 7 CoA + 6 CO2 + H2O + 6 NADP+
